name: Sleep When You're Dead (Ludum Dare 51)
description:
**DISCLAIMER**

Couldn't get art done in time for this one, so it doesn't look the prettiest. Would still love to hear what you think, though!

**

DESCRIPTION

In a barren wasteland inherited by opposing factions of Androids and Mutants, your faction must fight to survive.

You need power and the Androids have more batteries than you could ever dream. With your electro-stun abilities, no digital entities stand a chance as you take as you please.

There's only one problem... you're narcoleptic! Every 10 seconds you can't help but pass out right at your enemy's feet, leaving your base open for attack!

Think quick as you navigate the battlefield, scavenging parts to build defenses and turrets. This is your chance to be your Faction's hero!

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD

Interact: E

Quit: Escape
